title: The Steaming Cup
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffee house, located in an historic building, offers a vegetarian section of the menu. Also has a chalk board menu with vegan items listed at times, otherwise ask staff for details or to make veggie items vegan. Sells bakery items in a display case. A wall of teas and a vast selection of coffees are available. Shelves of board and box games to play.
